findings.title: Potentially incorrect (stale) ownership account information in migration scripts
findings.description: The account address used in the call `await proxy.changeAdmin("0xf0b1eef88956b0a307fa87b5f5671aad6a5d330f");` is the same as in the fork’s source repo, which may lead to undesired ownership or third-party control if the Harmony team does not have a private key for this address.

findings.title: Non-atomic deployment/initialization of the contracts
findings.description: Deployment/initialization of the BUSD contacts is not atomic, which could lead to unintended consequences such as a malicious third-party interfering with the process.
